EmailTemplate.description: US-0010667 - Notify Coupon Seller Owner when Items Uploaded by Seller
EmailTemplate.name: Coupon_Seller_Items_Uploaded_by_Seller
EmailTemplate.subject: New coupon items uploaded by seller for Coupon {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_Seller_Owner_FirstName__c},
Seller {!Coupon_Seller__c.Seller__c} has uploaded coupon items for Coupon {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_ID__c}
Please review the records and send the contract.
Coupon Seller record: {!Coupon_Seller__c.Name}.
Thank you
